publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1277 Bill Kidd: Glasgow Magazine Wins Award—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow City Council’s bi-monthly publication, Glasgow, the magazine for residents and businesses, edited by John Keil, on being voted Customer Magazine of the Year at the prestigious Periodical Publishers Association’s Scottish Magazine Awards 2007 for the second year running.

S3M-1277 Bill Kidd: Glasgow Magazine Wins Award—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow City Council’s bi-monthly publication, Glasgow, the magazine for residents and businesses, edited by John Keil, on being voted Customer Magazine of the Year at the prestigious Periodical Publishers Association’s Scottish Magazine Awards 2007 for the second year running. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Alasdair Allan*, Elaine Smith*, Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-1277 Glasgow Magazine Wins Award (lodged on 31 January 2008) Alex Neil*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-1277 Glasgow Magazine Wins Award (lodged on 31 January 2008) Stuart McMillan*
